snippet: Jesus Montero returned to the Bronx for the first time since the Yankees dealt their top hitting prospect to Seattle for two pitchers who are currently on the disabled list.
abstract: Seattle Mariners catcher Jesus Montero returns to the Bronx for the first time since the New York Yankees dealt their top hitting prospect to Seattle for two pitchers who are currently on the disabled list; Montero is already paying dividends for the Mariners.
lead_paragraph: Jesus Montero returned to the Bronx for the first time since the Yankees dealt their top hitting prospect to Seattle for two pitchers who are currently on the disabled list.

headline.seo: In Heart of Mariners Lineup, Montero Remains a Reminder to the Yankees
headline.main: In Heart of Mariners Lineup, a Reminder to the Yankees
headline.print_headline: In Heart of Seattle Lineup, a Yankee Reminder
